title: White House Budget Director to Deliver Remarks on the Economy | whitehouse.gov
content:
The White House




July 20, 2009

 



White House Budget Director to Deliver Remarks on the Economy




THE WHITE HOUSE  Office of the Press Secretary  ____________________________________________________________________________  FOR IMMEDIATE RELEASE                                                          July 20, 2009  White House Budget Director to Deliver Remarks on the Economy  A New Foundation for Growth: Assessing the Economic Recovery and Future Washington, DC—On Wednesday, July 22, at 1:00 p.m. EST, White House Office of Management and Budget Director Peter R. Orszag will deliver remarks to the  Council on Foreign Relations' C. Peter McColough Series on International Economics in New York. Director Orszag will discuss where the country is on its road to recovery and its efforts to make critical investments, restore fiscal discipline, and establish a foundation of growth in the economy. Who: Director of White House Office of Management and Budget Peter R. Orszag  What: The C. Peter McColough Series on International Economics   When: Wednesday, July 22, 2009   Where: The Harold Pratt House, 58 East 68th Street, New York, NY **The Council on Foreign Relations is handling all media logistics and credentialing. This event is open to accredited journalists only. Camera Set-Up Time:           11:15 AM-12:30 PM Press Registration:                12:30 PM-  1:00 PM Event Time:                             1:00 PM-  2:00 PM **RSVP REQUIRED**  RSVP by: 9:00 a.m., Wednesday, July 22, 2009  RSVP to: NYPressRSVP@cfr.org   Press Contact: Sarah Doolin, 212.434.9886; sdoolin@cfr.org.  Please contact Sarah Doolin if you are interested in bringing a camera. Camera Crew Entrance: Park Avenue between 67th and 68th Street. Audio & Lighting: TV quality lighting/Multbox provided. Please bring your own tape for cords. If you would like to bring a laptop, please contact Sarah Doolin at sdoolin@cfr.org so arrangements can be made for you in another room.      ###
